casebody.data:
Martin LEUTHE, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. ERIE RAILROAD COMPANY, Defendant-Appellant. No. 319. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 4, 1936. See, also, 12 F.Süpp. 161. Moot, Sprague, Marcy, Carr & Gulick, of Buffalo, N. Y. (William L. Marcy, Jr., and David L. Landy, both of Buffalo, N. Y., of counsel), for appellant. Searl & McElroy, of Syracuse, N. Y., for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and AUGUSTUS N. LIAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
